sub_title: Regional Director Airline Marketing at Embraer

school.name: IU International University of Applied Sciences

awards.title: BNP Paribas Innovation Award
awards.description:
I was part of the project team of SWM - Sales Workstation Mobile, winner of the innovation award of BNP Paribas 2013.
The competition is designed to honour employees who have harnessed their creativity and inventiveness to come up with innovative, value-creating solutions for customers.
Every year ten winners are chosen out of over 1000 projects from all over the world.

certifications.name: Certificate of Extra Curriculum in Aviation Management

company.name: IU International University of Applied Sciences

projects.title: Aviation Project III
projects.description: Main aim is to establish an airline which is financially feasible. All characteristics of the airline must be defined: strategy, brand, network, aircraft type, flight & rotation plan, product, pricing, sales & distribution strategy, marketing plan, high level organizational structure. The financial analysis shall include a five-year profit and loss statement, a cash flow plan, a capital expenditure plan (investments), major KPIs as well as a monthly route profitability analysis.

contributors.headline: Regional Director Airline Marketing at Embraer

projects.title: Aviation Project II
projects.description:
A worldwide operating integrator requires a new network strategy to integrate its European hub into its worldwide operations. Student teams are provided with all relevant data and are supposed to develop a proposal for this network redesign exercise. The following aspects must be considered:
•	European service levels
•	Aircraft payload / range charts
•	Aircraft utilization
•	Usage of ground service vehicles
•	Network cost structure
•	Shipment revenues
The necessary analyses rely mainly on the usage of the tools SAS and AirSched.

contributors.headline: Regional Director Airline Marketing at Embraer

projects.title: Aviation Project I
projects.description:
A worldwide operating passenger airline requires a new network strategy and design to strengthen the role of transfer traffic via its hub. Student teams are provided with all relevant data and are supposed to develop a proposal for this network redesign exercise. The following aspects must be considered:
•	O&D sizes
•	Passenger preferences
•	Aircraft payload / range charts
•	Aircraft utilization
•	Network cost structure
The necessary analyses rely mainly on the usage of the tools SAS, AirSched, and PACS.

contributors.headline: Regional Director Airline Marketing at Embraer

profile_positions.description:
Develop comprehensive marketing and sales strategies to support Embraer’s sale growth. Identify potential growth opportunities by evaluating commercial airline operations. Enhanced Embraer’s brand and products participating in conferences and events.

•	Acquired new customers and sustained the existing ones, enhancing the awareness of Embraer in the region.
•	Drove informed decision-making in preparing ad-hoc country and carrier-specific studies.
•	Developed marketing and sales campaigns to increase sales.
•	Presented valuable insights for organisational success by building and sustaining long-term relationships with external industry contacts and coordinating with current and prospective customers.
•	Delivered valuable guidance and support to colleagues and peers as per requirement by serving as a mentor.
profile_positions.title: Regional Director Airline Marketing

profile_positions.description:
Analysed the performance of commercial airlines in the area to maximise business growth while strategising sales and marketing plans. Development of regional sales plan and creation of airline-specific value propositions. Utilised Embraer software to evaluate and track aircraft performance and economics. 

•	Crafted customised analyses and presentations tailored to specific countries and carriers to facilitate targeted engagement.
•	Enhanced Embraer’s brand, product, and service awareness in the region by conducting market research. 
•	Located market growth opportunities by performing detailed analysis of all relevant macro- and micro-level metrics.
•	Established and cultivated external industry relationships while accompanying sales/capture teams on customer visits to deliver pertinent analyses and bolster collaborative engagement.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Conducted comprehensive analysis of existing routes by evaluating routes' performance and contributing insights for strategic optimisation. Played an integral role in improving overall profitability and connectivity of existing routes.

•	Devised efficient scheduling and rotation plans to enhance operational effectiveness and resource utilisation.
•	Monitored competitive landscape from other airlines to maintain market presence.
•	Performed multiple market research and economic feasibility studies for potential new destinations.
profile_positions.title: Network Planning and Developlment

profile_positions.description:
Improved overall operational accuracy by analysing revenues and vehicle market loans. Steered substantial efforts in maintaining sales representative’s network. 

•	Managed and controlled agreements with BNP Paribas-affiliated dealers, maximising operational reliability.
•	Contributed to developing new products by closely coordinating with the marketing department. 
•	Provided valuable support to operations and IT department for development of new applications.
profile_positions.title: Senior Revenue Analyst and Controller

profile_positions.description:
Coordinator of the Call Center Telemarketing (Sales of additional services for revolving credit card) with responsibility of:

•	Training and follow-up of new employees
•	Groups Supervisor
•	Management and planning of objectives
•	Statistical analysis of results
•	Collaboration with partners to develop new products
profile_positions.title: Training And Development Coordinator
